entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lewisporte
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 3.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Fog patches developing in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 31 December 2022
